verses.verse: In the year <S%H8141><s%> that the commander <S%H8661><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Ashdod, <S%H795><s%> when Sargon <S%H5623><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> him and he fought <S%H3898><s%> against Ashdod <S%H795><s%> and captured <S%H3920><s%> it,

at that time <S%H6256><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> through <S%H3027><s%> Isaiah <S%H9198><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amoz, <S%H531><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Go <S%H1980><s%> and loosen <S%H6605><s%> the sackcloth <S%H8242><s%> from your hips, <S%H4975><s%> and take <S%H2502><s%> your shoes <S%H5275><s%> off <S%H4480><s%> your feet. <S%H7272><s%>" And he did <S%H6213><s%> so, <S%H3651><s%> going <S%H1980><s%> naked <S%H6174><s%> and barefoot. <S%H3182><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Even <S%H9201><s%> as My servant <S%H5650><s%> Isaiah <S%H9198><s%> has gone <S%H1980><s%> naked <S%H6174><s%> and barefoot <S%H3182><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> as a sign <S%H226><s%> and token <S%H4159><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and Cush, <S%H3568><s%>

so <S%H3651><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%> will lead <S%H5090><s%> away <S%H5090><s%> the captives <S%H7628><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and the exiles <S%H1546><s%> of Cush, <S%H3568><s%> young <S%H5288><s%> and old, <S%H2205><s%> naked <S%H6174><s%> and barefoot <S%H3182><s%> with buttocks <S%H8351><s%> uncovered, <S%H2834><s%> to the shame <S%H6172><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>
"Then they shall be dismayed <S%H2865><s%> and ashamed <S%H954><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> of Cush <S%H3568><s%> their hope <S%H4007><s%> and Egypt <S%H4714><s%> their boast. <S%H8597><s%>

"So the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of this <S%H2008><s%> coastland <S%H339><s%> will say <S%H559><s%> in that day, <S%H3117><s%> 'Behold, <S%H2009><s%> such <S%H3541><s%> is our hope, <S%H4007><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> we fled <S%H5127><s%> for help <S%H5833><s%> to be delivered <S%H5337><s%> from the king <S%H4428><s%> of Assyria; <S%H804><s%> and we, how <S%H349><s%> shall we escape <S%H4422><s%>?'"
